name: MyBhagavadGita
0:
”Alexa, open My Bhagavad Gita.”
”Alexa, launch My Bhagavad Gita.”
”Ask My Bhagavad Gita for a random verse.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my bhagavad gita
des:
"Alexa, open My Bhagavad Gita...play chapter one verse one."
"Alexa, launch My Bhagavad Gita...play a verse about happiness."

Topics you can ask about:
happy
sad
love
lust
pleasure
anger
confusion
dealing with envy
death of loved one
laziness
discrimination
fear
forgetfulness
greed
seeking peace
demotivated
depression
losing hope
pride
practicing forgiveness
temptation
uncontrolled mind
loneliness
feeling sin

Source code: https://github.com/mrvivacious/My_Bhagavad_Gita
Audio source: http://audio.iskcondesiretree.com/index.php?q=f&f=%2F06_-_More%2F10_-_Audio_Books%2FBhagavat_Gita_Recitation_Sanskrit_to_English

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
